Forex rules! I make lots of money with it and you can too!

to jon108: Are you totally retarded? or did you loose your own money trying out the system? it sounds like you made some poor decisions and are now giving bad advice to others, so in conclusion: don't give advice if you know nothing about something.... Forex is not a get rich quick scheme, it is similar to stock but yet not the same. If you learn the market, and are NOT dumb and IGNORANT, than you can make money.....
A scam is something you pay for, and get nothing.  This ebook is free, so it's not a scam. I don't recommend to make transactions using this ebook, but it's not a scam.
